attributes.action: improve safety for cyclists, pedestrians and other road users and create goodwill between cyclists, pedestrians and other road users  by requiring highway authorities to provide adequate cycle paths wherever practicable,  by requiring all cycles ridden on public roads and spaces by adults and children over five years old to be registered and to display registration identifiers prominently,  by requiring prosecution with proportionate penalties for reckless, aggressive, intimidating or dangerous cycling and severe penalties for thereby causing injury or death,  and by requiring the enforcement of the prohibition of riding on footpaths other than designated and clearly marked cycle paths.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is intended to promote a safe and harmonious relationship between cyclists and the community by providing adequate resources for cyclists while requiring them to behave responsibly.
